body: Sometimes you multiply damage by some factor, such as on a critical hit. Roll the damage (with all modifiers) multiple times and total the results.
name: Multiplying Damage

sections.body: When you multiply damage more than once, each multiplier works off the original, unmultiplied damage. So if you are asked to double the damage twice, the end result is three times the normal damage.
sections.name: Note

sections.body: Extra damage dice over and above a weapon's normal damage are never multiplied.
sections.name: Exception
